explains: v. 乞求，恳求；乞讨，行乞；（狗）作乞求状
wordGroup: beg your pardon 对不起，请原谅
go begging vi. 行乞；销路极差
beg one's pardon 请某人再说一遍

sentences.en: Don't leave me here, I beg of you!
sentences.cn: 别把我扔在这儿，求求你！

sentences.en: He wants to see them beg for mercy.
sentences.cn: 他想亲眼看着他们求饶。

sentences.en: Cross decided to beg and wheedle a bit.
sentences.cn: 克罗斯决定小小地乞求和哄骗一下。
